Package ch.bfh.bti7081.s2015.red.PatientApp.LifeUp

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityState
    The ActivityState ist the main state and will be stored in the Activity.
    ActivityStateDeserializer
    this class is used to deserialize all ActivityStates.
    Circle
    this class represents a circle with a specific gps coordinate
    Closed
    The state Closed is the final state.
    Failed
    The state Failed is a TimeActivity state.
    Finished
    The state Finished is a NormalActivity state.
    FinishedInTime
    The state FinishedInTime is a TimeActivity state.
    FinishedTooLate
    The state FinishedTooLate is a TimeActivity state.
    Geofence
    just an inferface for geofences e.g.
    GoogleMapsHelper
    provides helper methods for calculating map center and zoom
    GpsCoordinate  
    GpsLocationSimulator
    this class simulates a gps location it provies a path of gps coordinates form a given start point to a specific destination.
    InProgress
    The state InProgress is a TimeActivity state.
    LifeUp  
    NormalActivity
    The state NormalActivity more specific state than ActivityState.
    Ready
    The state Ready is a NormalActivity state.
    Started
    The state Ready is a NormalActivity state.
    TimeActivity
    The state TimeActivity more specific state than ActivityState.
    TimeActivityManager
    This class handles all time relevant states, so they are going to be FinishedInTime or FinishedTooLate or Failed, depending if the patient has done the Activities in their soft/hard time limit or not.
    TimeActivityReady
    The state TimeActivityReady is a TimeActivity state.
